评论概述: Excelente calidad, cuidado personas con mucho busto!
评论详情: Compré estos uniformes para mi esposa desde Bogotá, Colombia, teniendo en cuenta nuestro fenotipo latino teníamos dudas con las tallas, y aquí están los comentarios que recibí y observé con ella.  El envío fue excelente, con tiempos rápidos y un buen embalaje que protegió perfectamente los productos. Eligió la talla S para la blusa, y aunque quedó bastante bien, estaba un poco ajustada en el busto. Al ver las medidas de la talla adicional podría resultar ser demasiado suelta y ancha, por lo que opté por la talla S y hacer un pequeño ajuste en la parte superior con un sastre quedando excelente. La tela de la blusa es de excelente calidad, tal como se describe en la página, e incluso superó nuestras expectativas. Definitivamente un 10 de 10, y muy contentos con la compra. ¡Recomendada ya que se ahorran dinero versus el almacén presencial y se consiguen en color blanco!

I am typically a size small in other scrub brands. I ordered a few pairs of these scrubs, (matching top and pants), and they fit very weird. I initially ordered a size medium top because it was noted that the top ran small and that it would be a good idea to size up. It was way too big, so I exchanged for a small. The top fit ok but tight at the chest, with no stretch. The rest of the shirt was almost baggy everywhere else.  The bottoms were too long for me. They dragged on the floor, even with tennis shoes on. The waistband is supposed to be adjustable but even tied as tight as I could tie it, they were falling down all day. A smaller size would have been too small for my thighs.  Not happy with the sizing and comfort. They also feel like they are cheaply made.

评论概述: Flattering and comfortable but not stretchy
评论详情: I am super picky with scrubs, but I actually do like this one quite a bit. I really like the shape of it there’s a lot of arm room and it kind of flares out which is cute. most scrubs are restricting in that area, but this one is not. The shape is very cute and flattering with the faux wrap. I wish it had more/better pockets but they get the job done. I am 5’4 around 170 lb and I got a large because I prefer my scrubs to be more roomy. I did deduct a star because it is not stretchy.  There’s a tiny bit of stretch, but I was looking for a stretchy material so I was pretty disappointed in that as it was advertised as two way stretch.  However it’s still pretty comfortable, the material is a little stiff but I think once I wear it more it’ll be better. Overall recommend!
